dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2023, President Tokayev just held an informal meeting with Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov in Turkestan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty three, President Tokayev just held an informal meeting with Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov in Turkestan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the spiritual capital of Kazakhstan—that city's got huge symbolic importance for Turkic peoples.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the spiritual capital of Kazakhstan-that city's got huge symbolic importance for Turkic peoples.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Welcoming the distinguished guest, the Head of State thanked him for visiting Turkestan " the spiritual capital of Kazakhstan, a city that holds sacred significance for all Turkic peoples.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're really pushing some major energy projects, like developing the Galkynysh gas field together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're really pushing some major energy projects, like developing the Galkynysh gas field together.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Special attention was given to expanding cooperation in the gas sector, particularly Kazakhstan's participation in the development of the Galkynysh gas field in partnership with foreign companies, Akorda's press service stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they mentioned aiming to hit a billion dollars in trade turnover soon, which is uh, pretty ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they mentioned aiming to hit a billion dollars in trade turnover soon, which is uh, pretty ambitious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They emphasized the need to identify new growth points and implement systemic measures to increase trade turnover to 1 billion USD in the coming years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like infrastructure's a big focus too—that Turghundi-Herat-Kandahar railway could be a game-changer for regional trade routes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like infrastructure's a big focus too-that Turghundi-Herat-Kandahar railway could be a game-changer for regional trade routes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev highlighted the significant potential of the Turghundi"Herat"Kandahar"Spin Boldak railway construction project, which, once successfully implemented, will diversify transport routes and expand export markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and they're also building that highway from Turkmenbashi to the Kazakh border, which should really boost the North-South transit corridor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and they're also building that highway from Turkmenbashi to the Kazakh border, which should really boost the North-South transit corridor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also noted that key roles in enhancing the North"South transit corridor are played by the Kazakhstan"Turkmenistan"Iran railway line and the Turkmenbashi"Garabogaz"Kazakhstan border highway currently under construction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, you know, it's not just economics—they talked about digitalization, education, even military training cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, you know, it's not just economics-they talked about digitalization, education, even military training cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the meeting addressed cooperation in education, healthcare, and digitalization, the press service reported. The Kazakh side expressed readiness to provide comprehensive support to Turkmenistan in digitalizing public services and in training IT specialists, military personnel, and medical staff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Kazakhstan's offering support with public service digitization, which is a smart move for strengthening ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Kazakhstan's offering support with public service digitization, which is a smart move for strengthening ties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Kazakh side expressed readiness to provide comprehensive support to Turkmenistan in digitalizing public services and in training IT specialists, military personnel, and medical staff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Berdimuhamedov seemed grateful too—he called Kazakhstan a key strategic partner and thanked them for backing that UN Peace and Trust initiative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Berdimuhamedov seemed grateful too-he called Kazakhstan a key strategic partner and thanked them for backing that U N Peace and Trust initiative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Chairman of the Halk Maslahaty expressed gratitude for the hospitality and called Kazakhstan one of Turkmenistan's key strategic partners. We thank you for supporting Turkmenistan's initiative at the UN to declare the International Year of Peace and Trust, said Berdimuhamedov.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that International Year of Peace and Trust—supported by the UN—really shows Turkmenistan's growing diplomatic clout.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that International Year of Peace and Trust-supported by the U N-really shows Turkmenistan's growing diplomatic clout.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev congratulated Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov on the start of the International Year of Peace and Trust, emphasizing that this initiative, supported by the UN, demonstrates Turkmenistan's high international standing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And this was all framed as an informal meeting, but you can tell there's some serious strategic planning happening behind the scenes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this was all framed as an informal meeting, but you can tell there's some serious strategic planning happening behind the scenes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the parties discussed prospects for further strengthening the multifaceted strategic partnership across the full spectrum of bilateral relations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. When leaders meet in a place like Turkestan, it's never just a casual chat—it's symbolism meets substance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. When leaders meet in a place like Turkestan, it's never just a casual chat-it's symbolism meets substance.
